articles.title: Nicholas Pooran critical of West Indies' fielders despite win vs Bangladesh | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: West Indies continued their winning run in the third T20I, beating Bangladesh by six wickets
articles.content:
"We will have a better attitude in our next game" © AFP
West Indian skipper Nicholas Pooran was furious over his deputy Rovman Powel when the latter fumbled in the field in two successive deliveries… [+2955 chars]
